title: Radio DJ keeps family at the center of his start up
text:
CNN's series often carry sponsorship originating from the countries and regions we profile. However, CNN retains full editorial control over all of its reports. Our sponsorship policy.

(CNN) Kris Fade's breakfast show has an audience of more than 1 million listeners every day on Virgin Radio Dubai.

It was on air that he first started talking about how he wasn't happy with the choice of kids snacks for his two daughters - and how he wanted to created his own.

So in 2018, he launched Fade Fit Kids, a start up that makes healthy munchies for children.

Watch the video at the top of this article to learn more about Fade's story.
description: Starting up your own business can be all consuming - long days, working weekends and time away from your loved ones. But radio personality, Kris Fade, has managed to strike the perfect work-life balance with his young company.
